name: Mamamoo Can Tell Your Future!
description:
You play as Wheein a sailor for the ship: Mamamoo. You find a box of cards and decide to follow the instructions and play the game. The cards promise to tell you your future but will it?

How to Play: 
1.You can either click a card to put it down or grab from the deck which is on the right. 
2. If you want to put a card down you must make sure your card number is 1 higher or 1 lower than the card number that is in the other deck (located in the left side).
3. Your future is based on what the sum of the cards' numbers are. 

There are 4 endings. 

Everything by me, except I do not own Mamamoo. 

The game might update in the future to recieve better  art and maybe instructions in-game.
